about_the_game:
Step into the wild and chaotic world of Test Dummy Takedown, an action-packed game where you play as a crash test dummy armed to the teeth, ready to do whatever it takes to survive. Battle your friends in frantic, fast-paced matches where only the sharpest and quickest will remain standing.

Gameplay

Multiplayer Mode

Engage in intense battles with 2 to 8 players in arenas full of surprises.

Weapons and Lives

Start each match with a pistol loaded with 30 bullets, and choose the number of lives (between 1 and 10) in the settings to customize the intensity of the game.

Power Customization

You can choose 3 powers from the available categories:

  • Movement: Choose powers like Super Speed or Super Jump to move faster or position yourself strategically.

  • Ability: Select powers that modify your traits, such as Invincibility or Knife Throw, to dominate your enemies.

  • Secondary Weapon: In addition to your pistol, choose secondary weapons like a Sniper or explosives to gain a tactical advantage.

Strategy

Power Management: You can carry up to three powers at a time. Choose wisely when to use them, or delete them if you’re waiting for a better opportunity.

Objective: The goal is simple: be the last dummy standing! Use all the tools at your disposal to eliminate your opponents and stay alive.

Test Dummy Takedown is the perfect game for fun-filled sessions with friends, where every match is unique and full of surprises. Who will be the last one standing?

It’s up to you!

name: Test Dummy Takedown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: IntelCore i3 gen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: IntelCore i5 gen5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Step into Test Dummy Takedown, an action-packed game where you play as an armed crash test dummy. Battle 2 to 8 players in arenas, collect random special powers, and be the last one standing. A fun and frantic game for exciting sessions with friends!
